ChIPbinner 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Analyzing binned ChIP-seq/Cut&Run data with ChIPbinner
  • Changelog

    Annotate clusters.

    annotate_clust.Rd

    Annotates clusters identified after using HDBSCAN.

    annotate_clust(
  number_of_clusters,
  matrix_file,
  pooled_bed_file,
  hdbscan_output_file,
  output_filename,
  out_dir
)

    Arguments

    number_of_clusters

    The total number of clusters identified by the HDBSCAN algorithm.

    matrix_file

    The matrix file of enrichment scores for the two samples being compared, generated from the pre_clus() function.

    pooled_bed_file

    The pooled BED file generated from 'pre_clus()' consisting of genomic coordinates found in both samples being compared.

    hdbscan_output_file

    The HDBSCAN output which specifies whether each bin falls into a specific cluster or not.

    output_filename

    Name for the matrix file and pooled BED file.

    out_dir

    The output directory.

    Value

    a R object consisting of multiple annotated clusters, each with their set of bins.

    Details

    Title

# system.file("extdata", "downsampled.Cal27.WT_input.H3K36me2.10kb.bed.gz", package = "ChIPbinner")
annotate_clust(number_of_clusters = 3,
               matrix_file = system.file("extdata", "downsampled.Cal27.WT.NSD1_KO.H3K36me2.10kb_mat.csv", package = "ChIPbinner"),
               pooled_bed_file = system.file("extdata", "downsampled.Cal27.WT.NSD1_KO.H3K36me2.10kb_pooled.bed.gz", package = "ChIPbinner"),
               hdbscan_output_file= system.file("extdata", "clus.downsampled.Cal27.WT.NSD1_KO.H3K36me2.10kb.100.100.txt", package = "ChIPbinner"),
               output_filename = "downsampled",
               out_dir=system.file("extdata",package = "ChIPbinner"))
